titleStmt.title: On the Quid Nunces of St Iames Park.

publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: How vain are Mortal Mans Endeavours
Said at St─Iames's Masr─Travers
Good Orleans dead, intruth its hard
Oh! May all states men dye prepar'd
I do foresee (and in foreseeing
He Equalls any man in being)
The Army ne'r can be disbanded
I wish the King were Safely landed
Ah! friends, Great changes threat this Land
All France & England's at a Stand
There's Mereweys over another effort de'e mark? strange Work
And there's the Czar, & there's the Turk
The Pope──an Indian merchant by
Cut short his Speech with this reply
Things at a stand, why dread such Changes
Ah! Sr─you Never Saw the Ganges
There dwells a race we call them Monkeys
Grave, Sober, Sage like you Quid Nunc-es
On either bank from bough to bough
They meet and Chat as we do Now
Whispers go round; they Grin, they shrug
They bow, they Smile, they Scratch they Hug
And just as Chance, & Whim Provoke them
They Either bite their friends, or stroak ym─
There have I Seen Some Active Prigg
To Shew his parts bestride a Twigg
Lord how the Chattering Tribe admire
Not that he's Wiser but that he's higher
All long to try the Ventrous Thing
For Pow'r is but to have Ones Swing
From Side to Side he Springs he Spurns
And bangs his Foes and friends by Turns
Thus as in Giddy Freaks he Bounces
Crack goes the Twigg and in he Flounces
Down the Swift stream the Wretch is Born
Never ah! never to Return
Z────ds what a fall has Our dear Broth──
Morbleau, crys One, & D──m me T'other
The Nations give a general Screech overk
None Cock's his Tail, none claws his breech
Each Trembles for the Publick Weal
And for a While forgets to steal
A while all Ey's intent and Steady
Pursue him whirling down the Eddy
But Out of mind when Out of View
Some Others Mounts the Twigg Anew
And buisness on Each Monkey Shore
Runs the Same track it run before.Y20-020B
